title: New Players
body: Hey weird question, when I first started and and got to level like 6, I got something like 400 free RP to see how premium in game currency works, now that was cool and all, but I convinced a mate of mine to play this game and he didnt receive it, curious to why it stopped, seems kinda unfair alot of players got this really cool and generous start to the game, felt like a warm welcome, like im not saying its a bad thing it stopped really, but it was a nice thing to have for new players, was it swapped for the hextech they get at like level 5? just curious about this more than anything, either way Im really glad to see riot is starting to do a few things for the community rather then be greedy guts, hopefully we will see more of that behaviour from them in the future :)

replies.body: I'll tell you the answer. hextech crafting. you get more than 400rp worth of skin/champs literally on the 1st key and chest which is very easy to get. so no need for the rp now really. enough free stuff without it.

I literally said i was thinking it was hextech haha, but yeah thats what i mean with the premium chests, pity they all give the same skins, that red yi skin, green ashe, and gaming console ward, r i p

ps: you get better value if you wait a while and buy more champions before you open the chests on a new account, since the chests do guarentee something but if you already have those things it gives you something else. A friend of mine makes alot of smurf accounts and this is something he found, I think he got like gravelord azir or whatever from his chests and a graves shard.
